author: Trump
message: Just had a great conversation with Prime Minister Abe of Japan. I told him that the just completed Olympic venue is magnificent. He has done an incredible job, one that will make him very proud. Good things will happen for Japan and their great Prime Minister. Lots of options!

author: Trump
message: We get along very well with the European leaders, but we had to make a decision ... We had to move quickly.  @realDonaldTrump  on making the decision to restrict travel:
